about_the_game:
This is a simulation of the game, can be free in the game according to their own ideas to create their own skills, but also according to their own ideas to set up different attributes of the skills, so that each player has different attributes.You can also freely combine cast skills to achieve a variety of different skill effects, full freedom of training and combat system.
According to the ancient Chinese civilization design of the game, theCultivation realm can be divided into: lian qi, zhuji, jindan,yuanying, fenshen, heti. Each level of skill needs to be set by the player according to the game conditions, not simply accumulated experience level.
In the Qi refining period, you can set your own movement route according to the human body's acupuncture points. Some of the acupuncture points will have five element attributes attached to them. After cultivating, the true qi will have a certain proportion of the five element attributes.
Skills can be combined into different effects according to Taoist nine character mantra, such as killing enemies with sword, flying with sword, protecting qi, divine sense exploration, etc. Later, more skill effects will be developed, such as summoning, invisibility, five element magic, etc
In the game, players will experience the cultivation civilization of ancient China and become a generation of cultivation leaders step by step. All practices generate different cultivation methods according to the player's choice. The completely free cultivation method may be invincible, or it may become a devil and explode. It is also possible to be hard at the low level and hard at the high level, as long as the skills you set are good enough.
With regard to skill casting, the basis of each skill is the same. According to your choice, you can combine various skills with different attributes, which are suitable for diversified battle scenes.
